topic.title: Importing a Refset from a file

body.section: A Reference set can be imported from a file. This is achieved via the Import refset spec from file under the main menu heading Refsets as shown in . The format of this file needs to conform to the SNOMED Reference Set Specification ( part of the SNOMED Release Format 2 specification available from the IHTSDO). In order for all users to see the imported reference set, it needs to be imported onto the user's promotion path. Import/export of refset specifications
